organizations: State University of New York at Albany
lead_paragraph: The Thompson brothers, Lyle and Miles, and their cousin, Ty, all Native Americans, are turning SUNY Albany into a lacrosse powerhouse.
snippet: The Thompson brothers, Lyle and Miles, and their cousin, Ty, all Native Americans, are turning SUNY Albany into a lacrosse powerhouse.
